attributes.title: Glitches all the time!
attributes.review: I couldn’t even login before it crashed on me! I do not recommend anyone getting this app! One of the worst apps I’ve ever downloaded! It’s probably a scam

attributes.title: Why
attributes.review: This app so terrible it took two hours to download and now after I signed up it kept giving me text notifications non-stop!!

attributes.title: Worst app ever🍊
attributes.review: This app is so bad when I first downloaded it took 9 hours to open it it was so glitchy when I opened it all I saw was a orange I think it broke my phone worst app ever don’t get it it’s a scam

attributes.title: THIS APP ISNT GOOD
attributes.review: It has no type of data or any information that is need to be heard! In my perspective and I’m sure many others this app needs to be updated with better advances or taken down!

attributes.title: Straight up dog doo doo
attributes.review:
Reviewer(optional)
This app took all my money it says do you agree to vote for Donald trump for next year? If you say yes nothing happens, if you say no it takes away all your money in your bank account.

attributes.title: Gave my apple devices a virus
attributes.review: This have my phone a virus in which I had to buy a new phone also affected my other app devices that had the same Apple ID as my phone.

I downloaded the app to support my orange god🍊and a group of Karen’s showed up at my house harassing me and it took 3 hours for the app to download and I have perfect WiFi😢 I am very traumatized because of this app it was glitchy and I got a harassed😭 DO NOT DOWNLOAD ITS HORRIBLE

attributes.title: This app is disgusting 👁👄👁
attributes.review: I hate this app it downloaded way to slow I don’t see the point in this app it’s boring and why would I want to have a racists app and I don’t want to see this app ever again 🤮🙄

attributes.title: This app is terrible
attributes.review:
Let me tell u this app has made my other apps slow and once I got this app my phone has been acting up 
This app is going places💕🧚🏻‍♂️to hell thats where it’s going😜🧚🏻‍♂️💕

attributes.title: Worst App Ever 🤮🤬
attributes.review: This app placed a virus on my phone and now I am having trouble accessing the internet. I can’t even open a single app without my phone glitching out. Idek how long will take to get the virus out 😡
